chunk:
Shine Skincare Co. Overnight Radiance Face Mask

Brand: Shine Skincare

Category: Mask

Ingredients: Aloe Vera, Hydroxyethyl Cellulose, Papaya Extract, Green Papaya Extract, Pineapple Extract, Mulberry Root Extract, Glycerin, Vanilla Oil, Blue Tansy Oil, Phenoxyethanol, Tetrasodium EDTA, Citric Acid, Mica

Directions: Apply to clean face in the evening after your serum. For dry skin types, allow to absorb 10 minutes then apply a facial oil or moisturizer.
Avoid eye area

Ingredient concerns: HIGH: Use Restrictions; LOW: Cancer, Allergies & Immunotoxicity, Developmental and Reproductive Toxicity
